name: Tulaytullah's Remembrance
description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When the character uses a Charged Attack: Spend 1 less Unaligned Element. (Can be triggered up to twice per Round)
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)

storytext: "In the end, all people, good or evil, will find themselves ground beneath the wheels of fate, and the sapphire city would fade, dissipating like tears beneath the scorching sun."
